title: Anyone else find that their photos aren't as clear on a Pixel 3 after updating to Android 11?
content:
All the pictures I've taken since updating to Android 11 aren't as clear and seem pixelated or have digital noise. Is anyone else finding this? It definitely seems like a software issue not hardware. The picture are taken in the same lighting as before as well.


On a separate note the back arrow in the messages app doesn't always work now.
